short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assistant makes it easier for you to give more info to ChatGPT by converting any file into text and adding it to your conversation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Assistant works by feeding text directly into ChatGPT UI

Updates:

v0.1.1: new branding. 

Roadmap:

2023 Q2:
- Load text from websites
- Load text from youtube videos

2023 Q3:
- Observer mode for insights. "I can help you with that"
- Talk mode.
- Animations 

2023 Q4:  
- Agent mode.
- Much more.
